dc_title_s: Plan de Mons: ville forte capitale du Comt√© d'Hainaut; Baillieu.
dc_description_s: Shows military operations during siege of 1706. Show public and outlying buildings, city streets, fortifications, fields, marshes, etc. Relief by hachures. Text written in French. Scale measured in toises. Dissected in 8 sections. 1 map, dissected and mounted on linen; 38 x 51 cm, folded in slipcase 22 x 15 cm.
